definition: to seek to profit by family ties
to climb (by pulling oneself up)/to implicate/to claim connections of higher status
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to use claims to kinship or friendship to climb socially (idiom)

sentences.english: The man tried every means to establish a relative relationship with government officials.
sentences.chinese: 那人用盡手段和政府官員攀親。
